00014 class Efs;

00016 typedef BTreeAlgorithms< EfsTreePtrNodeSize, int, int, EfsBTreeController > FreesBTreeBase;

00021 
00022 class FreesBTree : public BTreeAlgorithms< EfsTreePtrNodeSize, int, int, EfsBTreeController >
00023 {
00024 public:
00025 
00028         FreesBTree() :
00029         freeAmount_( 0 )
00030         {}
00031 
00034         virtual bool setFS( Efs *afs, int rootOffset, int blockSize )
00035         {
00036                 freeAmount_ = 0;
00037                 return FreesBTreeBase::setFS( afs, rootOffset, blockSize );
00038         }
00039 
00042         virtual bool add( const int &key, const int &data )
00043         {
00044                 if ( FreesBTreeBase::add( key, data ) )
00045                 {
00046                         freeAmount_ += data;
00047                         return true;
00048                 }
00049 
00050                 return false;
00051         }
00052 
00055         virtual bool remove( const int &key )
00056         {
00057                 int freeSize = 0;
00058                 if ( FreesBTreeBase::remove( key, freeSize ) )
00059                 {
00060                         freeAmount_ -= freeSize;
00061                         return true;
00062                 }
00063 
00064                 return false;
00065         }
00066 
00069         virtual void changeData( const int &key, const int &newData )
00070         {
00071                 if ( !root_ )
00072                 {
00073                         return;
00074                 }
00075 
00076                 int index = 0, parentIndex = 0;
00077                 bool found = false;
00078                 NodeType *node = FreesBTreeBase::findNode( root_, key, index, parentIndex, found );
00079 
00080                 if ( !node || index < 0 )
00081                 {
00082                         releaseCache( false );
00083                         return;
00084                 }
00085 
00086                 if ( found )
00087                 {
00088                         // Key found
00089                         freeAmount_ -= node->elems_[ index ].data_;
00090                         node->elems_[ index ].data_ = newData;
00091                         freeAmount_ += node->elems_[ index ].data_;
00092                         releaseCache( true );
00093                         return;
00094                 }
00095 
00096                 releaseCache( false );
00097         }
00098 
00101         inline gint64 freeAmount()
00102         {
00103                 return freeAmount_;
00104         }
00105 
00106         gint64 freeAmount_;
00107 };
